00051 template <unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00052 class AbstractTetrahedralElement : public AbstractElement<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>
00053 {
00054 protected:
00055 
00061     void RefreshJacobian(c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM>& rJacobian);
00062 
00063 public:
00064 
00071     AbstractTetrahedralElement(unsigned index, const std::vector<Node<SPACE_DIM>*>& rNodes);
00072 
00079     AbstractTetrahedralElement(unsigned index=INDEX_IS_NOT_USED);
00080 
00084     virtual ~AbstractTetrahedralElement()
00085     {}
00086 
00090     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> CalculateCentroid() const;
00091 
00098     void CalculateJacobian(c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM>& rJacobian,
00099                            double& rJacobianDeterminant);
00100 
00107     void CalculateWeightedDirection(c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM>& rWeightedDirection, double& rJacobianDeterminant);
00108 
00112     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> CalculateNormal();
00113 
00121     void CalculateInverseJacobian(c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM>& rJacobian,
00122                                   double& rJacobianDeterminant,
00123                                   c_matrix<double, ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& rInverseJacobian);
00124 
00129     double GetVolume(double determinant) const;
00130 
00139     void GetStiffnessMatrixGlobalIndices(unsigned problemDim, unsigned* pIndices) const;
00140 };
